abstract: Liberty Media agreed on Tuesday to buy a 27.3 percent stake in the cable services provider Charter Communications for $2.6 billion, in the latest deal by the billionaire John C. Malone.
snippet: Liberty Media agreed on Tuesday to buy a 27.3 percent stake in the cable services provider Charter Communications for $2.6 billion, in the latest deal by the billionaire John C. Malone.

headline.main: Malone Takes a Step Back Into Cable With Charter Stake
headline.print_headline: Malone Takes a Step Back Into Cable With Charter Stake

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
